verbs.description: [ARG0: South Korean President Moon Jae - in and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: met] [ARGM-TMP: for two hours] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday afternoon] , and discussed implementing the agreements from the previous summit with President Trump .

[ARG0: South Korean President Moon Jae - in and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] met for two hours on Saturday afternoon , and [V: discussed] [ARG1: implementing the agreements from the previous summit with President Trump] .
